description:
Looking to join a DG Solar & Storage developer and Financer? One of our clients specializes in community solar, has its hands in the agrovoltaics and landfill-development space, and partners with other DG developers to assist in financing getting their projects through to NTP.

They have 1GW in the pipeline, 300MW in operation, and were recently purchased by a global infrastructure fund this year. They are looking for someone with business development expertise to specialize in forming and maintaining strategic relationships with Development Partners in the community solar space.

Qualifications:
• 7+ years of experience in renewables (primarily DG Solar)
• Extensive connections they can immediately leverage in the DG space
• Prior experience with project acquisitions and strategic partnerships
• Thorough knowledge of signing and acquiring DSAs

Base: $150-200k

Bonus: Uncapped project commission

Fully remote with 25-30% travel

Interested? Let's connect!
